title: New: Wolf Alice – Storms
content:
I love Wolf Alice for so many reasons.

Given the colossal amount of praise they’ve had thrusted upon them, many would have diluted their sound and churned out an album of dull, chart-baiting pop hits, but the London quartet actually appearing to be getting heavier, and more cutting. Another track that encapsulates the ferocity of their live performances, Storm will no doubt be another favourite on their forthcoming tour, dates below.

Storm is lifted from Creature Songs, out 26 May, pre-order here.
